vis_data_error.paragraph: The BMW iX, an EV SUV built on a dedicated platform with a huge interior, impressive performance, and excellent range and charging, took top spot in the premium segment with a score of 790 out of 1,000, which also made it 2025â€™s most satisfying EV to own, according to the survey. It was followed by another BMW, the i4 hatchback, with a score of 783; the Rivian R1S SUV; Tesla Model 3 sedan; and Polestar 2. facts.fact_content: The BMW iX scored 790 out of 1,000.
